mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY(community_id, com_name, com_description, is_private, user_num, category_id) VALUES(com_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{com_name}, #{com_description}, #{is_private}, #{user_num}, #{category_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET com_name = #{com_name}, com_description = #{com_description}, is_private = #{is_private}, icon_image = #{icon_image}, banner_image = #{banner_image}, category_id = #{category_id} WHERE community_id = #{community_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM community_follow WHERE community_id = #{community_id} AND user_num = #{user_num}
DELETE FROM community_favorites WHERE community_id = #{community_id} AND user_num = #{user_num}
mapper.select: SELECT community_id, com_name, com_description, icon_image, banner_image, is_private, member_count, post_count, TO_CHAR(created_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created_date, today_visit, total_visit, user_num, category_id FROM COMMUNITY WHERE com_name = #{com_name}
